name: Lava Child
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from metal weapons
book: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.Metal Immunity: The lava child can move through metal without hindrance, and it has advantage on attack rolls against any creature wearing metal armor or using a metal shield.

actions.Multiattack: The lava child makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d4 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.
